robotic: [{"name": "Patrolling", "description": "Keep visiting a set of locations, but not a particular order. The patrolling problem also appears in literature as surveillance.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "locations", "format": "list", "type": "location"}]}, {"name": "OrderedPatrolling", "description": "Sequence patrolling deos not forbid to visit a successor location before its predecessor. Ordered patrolling ensures that (after a successor is visited) the successor is not visited (again) before its predecessor.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "locations", "format": "list", "type": "location"}]}, {"name": "StrictOrderedPatrolling", "description": "The ordered patrolling does not avoid a predecessor location to be visited multiple times before its successor. Strict Ordered Patrolling ensures that, after a predecessor is visited, it is not visited again before its successor. ", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "locations", "format": "list", "type": "location"}]}, {"name": "Visit", "description": "Visit a set of location in an unspecified order", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "locations", "format": "list", "type": "location"}]}, {"name": "StrictOrderedVisit", "description": "The ordered visit pattern does not avoid a predecessor location to be visited multiple times before its successor. Strict ordered visit forbids the behavior.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "locations", "format": "list", "type": "location"}]}, {"name": "OrderedVisit", "description": "The sequenced visit pattern does not forbid to visit a successor location before its predecessor, but only that after the predecessor is visited the successor is also visited. Ordered visit forbids a successor to be visited before its predecessor.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "locations", "format": "list", "type": "location"}]}, {"name": "InstantaneousReaction", "description": "The occurrence of a stimulus instantaneously triggers a counteraction.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger", "format": "value", "type": "any"}, {"name": "reaction", "format": "value", "type": "any"}]}, {"name": "BoundReaction", "description": "A counteraction must be performed every time and only when a specific location is entered.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger", "format": "value", "type": "any"}, {"name": "reaction", "format": "value", "type": "any"}]}, {"name": "BoundDelay", "description": "A counteraction must be performed, in the next time instant, every time and only when a specific location is entered.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger", "format": "value", "type": "any"}, {"name": "reaction", "format": "value", "type": "any"}]}, {"name": "PromptReaction", "description": "The occurrence of a stimulus triggers a counteraction promptly, i.e in the next time instant.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger", "format": "value", "type": "any"}, {"name": "reaction", "format": "value", "type": "any"}]}, {"name": "DelayedReaction", "description": "The occurrence of a stimulus triggers a counteraction some time later.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger", "format": "value", "type": "any"}, {"name": "reaction", "format": "value", "type": "any"}]}, {"name": "Wait", "description": "Inaction is desired till a stimulus occurs.", "ltl_example": "", "arguments": [{"name": "do", "format": "value", "type": "any"}, {"name": "until", "format": "value", "type": "any"}]}]
